member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID
member.summary: Enumerates the possible values of the PropertyId member of the structure passed as input to the IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY request to retrieve the properties of a storage device or adapter.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the device descriptor, .

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the adapter descriptor, .

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceIdProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the device identifiers provided with the SCSI vital product data pages. Data is returned using the structure.

summary.para: Intended for driver usage. Indicates that the caller is querying for the unique device identifiers. Data is returned using the STORAGE_DEVICE_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER structure (see the storduid.h header in the DDK).
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
Indicates that the caller is querying for the write cache property. Data is returned using the structure.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageMiniportProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

summary.para: Indicates that the caller is querying for the access alignment descriptor, .
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
Indicates that the caller is querying for the seek penalty descriptor, .
Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
Indicates that the caller is querying for the trim descriptor, .
Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceWriteAggregationProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceDeviceTelemetryProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

summary.para: Indicates that the caller is querying for the logical block provisioning property. Data is returned using the structure.
Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.
Indicates that the caller is querying for the device power descriptor. Data is returned using the structure.
Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.
Indicates that the caller is querying for the copy offload parameters property. Data is returned using the structure.
Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceResiliencyProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceMediumProductType
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the medium product type. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterRpmbProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for RPMB support and properties. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterCryptoProperty
member.summary: Provides info on the storage adapter encryption capabilities. This is currently supported on UFS (Universal Flash Storage) adapters.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceIoCapabilityProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the device I/O capability property. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterProtocolSpecificProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for protocol-specific data from the adapter. Data is returned using the structure. See the remarks for more info.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceProtocolSpecificProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for protocol-specific data from the device. Data is returned using the structure. See the remarks for more info.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterTemperatureProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying temperature data from the adapter. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceTemperatureProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for temperature data from the device. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterPhysicalTopologyProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for topology information from the adapter. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDevicePhysicalTopologyProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for topology information from the device. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceAttributesProperty
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceManagementStatus
member.summary: Provides health information about the storage device (specifically for the persistent memory stack).

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageAdapterSerialNumberProperty
member.summary: Indicates that the caller is querying for the adapter serial number. Data is returned using the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceLocationProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceNumaProperty
member.summary: Provides the non-uniform memory access (NUMA) node of the storage device.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceZonedDeviceProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceUnsafeShutdownCount
member.summary: Provides the unsafe shutdown count value used to determine if the device data might have been lost during a power loss event (specifically for the persistent memory stack).

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceEnduranceProperty
member.summary: Provides info on how many bytes have been read/write from a solid-state drive (SSD). This property is supported only for Non-Volatile Memory Express (NVMe) devices that implement a certain NVMe feature.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceLedStateProperty
member.summary: Provides info on the state of the LED associated with a storage device. This is a server-oriented feature.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageDeviceSelfEncryptionProperty
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: STORAGE_PROPERTY_ID.StorageFruIdProperty
member.summary: Provides identification info for a storage device that can be physically replaced with a Field Replacement Unit (FRU).
